storage_permission_description: To save photos on your device

enter_username_first_last: Enter your username, first name, and last name
whom_to_meet: Who do you want to meet?
gym_stage_height_weight: Your gym stage, height, and weight

no_location_dialog_content: If you do not provide your location, users will be shown randomly. You can change this later in your profile. Do you wish to continue without a location?

password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
name_no_numbers: First and last name should not contain numbers
must_be_18: You must be at least 18 years old to register
block_user_confirm: Are you sure you want to block this user?
premium_scroll_message: To scroll upward and go back to the previous user, you must be premium. Would you like to purchase it?
premium_le_gustas_message: To view users who liked you, you need to be premium. Would you like to purchase it?
like_limit_message: You have reached the maximum number of likes. Wait {hours} hours and {minutes} minutes or watch a video to extend it.
token_not_found_login: Token not found. Please log in.
match_message: You and {username} have liked each other
confirm_cancel_subscription_message: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
max_5_photos: You can select a maximum of 5 photos
delete_conversation_message: Do you want to delete the chat with {username}?
cannot_proceed_with_explicit: Registration cannot proceed with explicit content. Please select different images.
must_select_profile_picture: You must select a profile picture to continue
verification_code_sent: Verification code sent to your email
height_must_be_between_100_250: Height must be between 100 and 250 cm
weight_must_be_between_40_200: Weight must be between 40 and 200 kg
accept_terms: I have read and accept the
terms_intro_content: Welcome to GYMswipe. These Terms and Conditions govern the use of our application and the services offered. By registering and using GYMswipe, you agree to comply with these terms. If you disagree, please do not use the application.
terms_eligibility_content:
To use GYMswipe you must:
• Be at least 18 years old.
• Create an account with valid and verifiable information.
• Not have been convicted of sexual offenses.
terms_account_content:
• You must provide truthful and accurate information.
• You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.
• We reserve the right to suspend or delete fraudulent accounts or those that violate these terms.
terms_acceptable_use_content:
GYMswipe users must:
• Use the application in a respectful and legal manner.
• Not harass, threaten, or harm other users.
• Not use the platform for commercial purposes without authorization.
• Not share offensive, violent, defamatory, or illegal content.
terms_user_content_content:
• You are responsible for the content you post on GYMswipe.
• You grant us a non-exclusive license to display your content in the application.
• We reserve the right to remove content that violates these terms.
terms_plans_content:
• GYMswipe offers free and paid features.
• Subscription payments are non-refundable, except in cases required by law.
• We reserve the right to modify the prices and features of premium plans.
terms_liability_content:
• GYMswipe does not guarantee success in interactions or safety of meetings outside the platform.
• We are not responsible for inappropriate conduct by other users.
• The application is provided "as is" and we do not guarantee it will be error-free or uninterrupted.
terms_termination_content:
We reserve the right to suspend or cancel accounts without prior notice if:
• These terms are violated.
• Suspicious or fraudulent activities are detected.
terms_privacy_content:
• We comply with data protection regulations.
• Please refer to our Privacy Policy to learn how we handle your personal information.
terms_modifications_content: We may modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of important changes.
terms_law_content: These terms are governed by the laws of the country where we operate. Any dispute will be resolved in the corresponding courts.
terms_contact_content: For any inquiries about these terms, contact us at contact@gymswipe.app
privacy_intro_content: Welcome to GYMswipe. The privacy of our users is a priority. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information. By using our application, you accept the terms of this policy.
privacy_collection_content:
We collect the following information:
• Registration Data: Name, email, date of birth, gender, approximate location.
• Profile Data: Photos, description, preferences, interests.
• Usage Data: Interactions with other users, messages sent and received.
• Device Data: Device type, IP address, operating system, unique identifiers.
• Location: We may collect and process location data if you grant permission.
privacy_usage_content:
We use your information to:
• Create and manage your account.
• Connect compatible users based on their preferences.
• Improve application security and prevent fraud.
• Personalize the user experience.
• Send notifications about the application.
• Comply with legal obligations.
privacy_sharing_content:
We may share your information with:
• Other Users: Your profile and data visible in the application.
• Service Providers: Companies that help us operate the application (hosting, data analysis, payments).
• Legal Authorities: If required by law or to protect rights and security.
privacy_security_content: We implement security measures to protect your information, but no Internet transmission is 100% secure. We use encryption, restricted access, and regular monitoring to protect your data.
privacy_retention_content: We retain your information as long as you maintain an active account or as necessary to provide services. You can request deletion of your account at any time.
privacy_rights_content:
Depending on your location, you may have rights regarding your personal data, including:
• Access to your data.
• Correction of inaccurate information.
• Deletion of data.
• Restriction or objection to processing.
• Data portability.
privacy_children_content: GYMswipe is not directed at individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect information from minors. If we discover that we have collected information from a minor, we will delete it immediately.
privacy_international_content: Your data may be transferred and processed in countries other than your own, where data protection laws may be different. We take measures to ensure that your data is adequately protected.
privacy_changes_content: We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes through the application or by email.
privacy_contact_content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us at privacy@gymswipe.app.
must_accept_terms: You must accept the terms and conditions to continue.
app_description_text: GYMswipe is an app to connect with people who share your passion for fitness and the gym.
confirm_report_message: Are you sure you want to report this user for {reason}?
